thread.section_title: NameTagCountry.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NameTagCountry.com | nametagcountry.com
thread.title: PATRICK BRAUN

author: PATRICK BRAUN
title: PATRICK BRAUN
text:
I've ordered twice from NameTagCountry. I think their products age great, service is good and process time is reasonable. The only thing I would consider changing is for existing customers to see more details on past orders. For instance, I couldn't remember if I ordered a name tag for a specific employee. When I went online to the old order it just said quantity 30. I had to email for more information. That is the only thing at this time that I would aim to improve.
Thanks
